label: Chaos Gremlin
text: Justin once tried to explain quantum mechanics to a barista just to see what would happen. He collects hobbies like trading cards and has strong opinions about font kerning. If you need someone to start a passionate debate about whether a hot dog is a sandwich, he's your guy.

label: Class Clown
text: Justin is the person who sends you a 3-minute voice memo at midnight about an idea he just had. He's dangerously curious, mildly sleep-deprived, and has never met a Wikipedia rabbit hole he didn't follow. He thinks meetings should have intermissions.

label: Casual Friend
text: Justin is a builder and a thinker who doesn't take himself too seriously. He's into design, code, music, and the kinds of questions that don't have clean answers. He'd rather have an interesting conversation than a polished pitch deck.

label: Coffee Chat
text: Justin is curious about how things work — software, organizations, people. He spends his time building things on the internet and reading widely. He's always down to grab coffee and talk about whatever you're obsessed with right now.

label: The Real Me
text: Justin is a generalist who believes the most interesting ideas live at the intersection of disciplines. He writes, codes, designs, and leads — not because he's good at all of them, but because he can't help exploring. He's driven by curiosity and a desire to make things that matter.

label: Dinner Party
text: Justin Graham is a technologist and creative thinker. He's passionate about building products, exploring ideas, and connecting people. His work spans software development, design, and leadership, with a focus on creating things that are both useful and beautiful.

label: Networking Event
text: Justin Graham is a software engineer and product thinker with experience in full-stack development and technical leadership. He's interested in the intersection of technology, design, and human behavior, and enjoys building products that solve real problems.

label: LinkedIn Bio
text: Justin Graham is a technology professional with expertise in software engineering, product development, and team leadership. He brings a cross-disciplinary approach to problem solving, combining technical depth with design sensibility and strategic thinking.

label: Conference Speaker
text: Justin Graham is an engineer and technologist who focuses on building high-quality software products. With experience spanning frontend development, systems design, and organizational leadership, he brings a rigorous yet creative approach to the challenges of modern software development.

label: Board Meeting
text: Justin Graham is a seasoned technology leader with a track record of delivering impactful software products. He combines deep technical expertise with strategic vision and cross-functional leadership capabilities. His approach emphasizes operational excellence, data-driven decision making, and building high-performing engineering organizations.
